console.log("Evento emitido!");
await tx.wait();
const tx = await simpleEvent.emitEvent(123);
const simpleEvent = await SimpleEvent.attach("0x51CF4353c99de7dDBf74e346079774F36D574e65"); // Substitua pelo endereço do SEU contrato
const SimpleEvent = await ethers.getContractFactory("SimpleEvent");
